Today in Cañete we present the Arauco Avanza Plan. A set of measures to promote the integral development of the 7 communes of Arauco.
This Plan will improve production, connectivity, health, education and quality of life in Arauco.
The Arauco Avanza Plan means an investment of more than 600 million dollars between 2012 and 2014.

Today we enact the law that creates disabilities and the registry of convicts for sexual crimes against minors: http://t.co/ItRxBqBc

275 troops participated in operations in the two cities, from 6am until 8:45 a.m., they recovered 17 houses taken by mareros
More important: they saved a 10-year-old girl who had been taken as a 'companion' by a gangster because she was a minor

Today we enact the Law of the Food Solidarity Bonus that will benefit 1,940,000 families, equivalent to 7 million compatriots.
From July we will make delivery of this bonus. They are 40 thousand pesos per family and 7,500 additional pesos for each child or load.
